name: deploy-cmr
description: Create a CMR ticket linked to a work item and notify data-engineering-only Slack channel for prod deployment
author: data-engineering-team

plugins.name: atlassian
plugins.description: Atlassian plugin (atlassian@claude-plugins-official) — must be connected to Resonate Jira

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Slack plugin — must be connected to Resonate Slack workspace
plugins.installHint: Connect Slack via Claude Code settings

permissions: Write access to CMR project in Jira
Permission to post in #data-engineering-only Slack channel

arguments.description: Jira ticket key to link to the CMR (e.g., CDP-118328)
